Class ConfigBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.greghaines.jesque.ConfigBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ConfigBuilder
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A fluent-style builder for Configs.
    Author:
    Greg Haines
    See Also:
    Config, Serialized Form
